title: What to expect from January's Fed meeting as Powell faces looming DOJ probe
full_text:
What to expect from January's Fed meeting as Powell faces looming DOJ probe. The Federal Reserve will likely hold rates steady at its January meeting, even as Jerome Powell faces mounting pressure from Trump amid the DOJ probe.. Jerome Powell will leave his post in May.Al Drago/Getty Images
  • Fed expected to hold interest rates steady amid stubborn inflation and disappointing jobs numbers.
  • Powell is facing a D… [+3827 chars]
